TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class Rect : Java.Lang.Object, Android.OS.IParcelable, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Rect extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.OS.IParcelable, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Rect holds four integer coordinates for a rectangle.

remarks.para: Rect holds four integer coordinates for a rectangle. The rectangle is represented by the coordinates of its 4 edges (left, top, right bottom). These fields can be accessed directly. Use width() and height() to retrieve the rectangle's width and height. Note: most methods do not check to see that the coordinates are sorted correctly (i.e. left <= right and top <= bottom).

Docs.param: The X coordinate of the point being tested for containment
The Y coordinate of the point being tested for containment
Docs.summary: Returns true if (x,y) is inside the rectangle.

remarks.para: Returns true if (x,y) is inside the rectangle. The left and top are considered to be inside, while the right and bottom are not. This means that for a x,y to be contained: left <= x

public void Inset (int dx, int dy);
.method public hidebysig instance void Inset(int32 dx, int32 dy) cil managed

Docs.param: The amount to add(subtract) from the rectangle's left(right)
The amount to add(subtract) from the rectangle's top(bottom)
Docs.summary: Inset the rectangle by (dx,dy).

remarks.para: Inset the rectangle by (dx,dy). If dx is positive, then the sides are moved inwards, making the rectangle narrower. If dx is negative, then the sides are moved outwards, making the rectangle wider. The same holds true for dy and the top and bottom.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Intersect (Android.Graphics.Rect r);
.method public hidebysig instance bool Intersect(class Android.Graphics.Rect r) cil managed

Docs.param: The rectangle being intersected with this rectangle.
Docs.summary: If the specified rectangle intersects this rectangle, return true and set this rectangle to that intersection, otherwise return false and do not change this rectangle.

remarks.para: If the specified rectangle intersects this rectangle, return true and set this rectangle to that intersection, otherwise return false and do not change this rectangle. No check is performed to see if either rectangle is empty. To just test for intersection, use intersects()

MemberSignature.Value: public void Sort ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Sort() cil managed

Docs.summary: Swap top/bottom or left/right if there are flipped (i.e. left > right and/or top > bottom).

remarks.para: Swap top/bottom or left/right if there are flipped (i.e. left > right and/or top > bottom). This can be called if the edges are computed separately, and may have crossed over each other. If the edges are already correct (i.e. left <= right and top <= bottom) then nothing is done.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

Docs.param: The rectangle being unioned with this rectangle
Docs.summary: Update this Rect to enclose itself and the specified rectangle.

remarks.para: Update this Rect to enclose itself and the specified rectangle. If the specified rectangle is empty, nothing is done. If this rectangle is empty it is set to the specified rectangle.
